org.apache.ignite.internal.visor.util

Class VisorTaskUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ignite.internal.visor.util.VisorTaskUtils

  • public class VisorTaskUtils
extends Object
    Contains utility methods for Visor tasks and jobs.

      • collectEvents

        public static Collection<VisorGridEvent> collectEvents(Ignite ignite,
                                                       String evtOrderKey,
                                                       String evtThrottleCntrKey,
                                                       boolean all,
                                                       IgniteClosure<Event,VisorGridEvent> evtMapper)
        Grabs local events and detects if events was lost since last poll.
        Parameters:
        ignite - Target grid.
        evtOrderKey - Unique key to take last order key from node local map.
        evtThrottleCntrKey - Unique key to take throttle count from node local map.
        all - If true then collect all events otherwise collect only non task events.
        evtMapper - Closure to map grid events to Visor data transfer objects.
        Returns:
        Collections of node events

      • collectEvents

        public static List<VisorGridEvent> collectEvents(Ignite ignite,
                                                 String evtOrderKey,
                                                 String evtThrottleCntrKey,
                                                 int[] evtTypes,
                                                 IgniteClosure<Event,VisorGridEvent> evtMapper)
        Grabs local events and detects if events was lost since last poll.
        Parameters:
        ignite - Target grid.
        evtOrderKey - Unique key to take last order key from node local map.
        evtThrottleCntrKey - Unique key to take throttle count from node local map.
        evtTypes - Event types to collect.
        evtMapper - Closure to map grid events to Visor data transfer objects.
        Returns:
        Collections of node events

      • fileTree

        public static List<VisorLogFile> fileTree(File file,
                                          int maxDepth,
                                          @Nullable
                                          FileFilter filter)
                                   throws IOException
        Finds all files in folder and in it's sub-tree of specified depth.
        Parameters:
        file - Starting folder
        maxDepth - Depth of the tree. If 1 - just look in the folder, no sub-folders.
        filter - file filter.
        Returns:
        List of found files.
        Throws:
        IOException - If failed to list files.

      • readBlock

        public static VisorFileBlock readBlock(File file,
                                       long off,
                                       int blockSz,
                                       long lastModified)
                                throws IOException
        Read block from file.
        Parameters:
        file - - File to read.
        off - - Marker position in file to start read from if -1 read last blockSz bytes.
        blockSz - - Maximum number of chars to read.
        lastModified - - File last modification time.
        Returns:
        Read file block.
        Throws:
        IOException - In case of error.

      • reachableByPing

        public static boolean reachableByPing(InetAddress addr,
                                      int reachTimeout)
        Checks if address can be reached using one argument InetAddress.isReachable() version or ping command if failed.
        Parameters:
        addr - Address to check.
        reachTimeout - Timeout for the check.
        Returns:
        True if address is reachable.

      • startLocalNode

        public static List<Process> startLocalNode(@Nullable
                                           IgniteLogger log,
                                           String cfgPath,
                                           int nodesToStart,
                                           boolean quite,
                                           Map<String,String> envVars)
                                    throws IOException
        Start local node in terminal.
        Parameters:
        log - Logger.
        cfgPath - Path to node configuration to start with.
        nodesToStart - Number of nodes to start.
        quite - If true then start node in quiet mode.
        envVars - Optional map with environment variables.
        Returns:
        List of started processes.
        Throws:
        IOException - If failed to start.
